wins.title: All Epic 4 P0/P1 quality gates applied before Epic 5 start
wins.impact: Pre-epic gate mechanism successfully prevented quality debt carryforward

wins.title: FluentValidation architectural test eliminated validator gaps
wins.impact: Experiment validated — structural enforcement prevents review-time validator findings

wins.title: ESLint exhaustive-deps enforcement eliminated stale closure findings
evidence_refs: E-008: PASS — zero stale closure findings
wins.impact: Hook dependency defects prevented at build time instead of review time

wins.title: Important finding fixed within same epic (fast feedback)
evidence_refs: Story 5.1 IMPORTANT-1: missing StaleOnly filter tests
wins.impact: 1 fix cycle, same-day resolution, re-verified and approved

wins.title: 26 new frontend tests added with zero failures
wins.impact: Test suite growth aligned with feature growth, fast execution time maintained

problems.title: Backend test execution blocked — zero Epic 5 backend tests verified
evidence_refs: Section 3: Backend Tests not executed — requires .NET 10 runtime
17 new tests added but not run
problems.impact: 17 new backend tests (9 handler + 2 validator + 4 functional + 2 filter) written but never executed; regression risk unknown

problems.title: Demo walkthrough completely blocked — zero ACs verified end-to-end
evidence_refs: Docker Compose exists but not exercised
problems.impact: 100% of acceptance criteria (16 ACs across Stories 5.1 and 5.2) unverified in integrated environment; AC verification relies solely on unit/integration tests

problems.title: Code coverage measurement missing — no regression baseline
evidence_refs: Epic 4 action A-002: Code coverage CI with thresholds — APPLIED
problems.impact: Coverage CI configured (Epic 4 A-002) but no coverage data reported; cannot verify coverage thresholds or identify untested paths

problems.title: ESLint results not captured — hook dependency verification incomplete
evidence_refs: E-008 experiment relies on ESLint exhaustive-deps enforcement
problems.impact: Experiment E-008 reports PASS based on review findings, but ESLint gate not verified; hook compliance unconfirmed

problems.title: Pre-existing TypeScript errors carried from Epic 4
evidence_refs: Section 3: 3 tsc errors — ALL PRE-EXISTING from Epic 4 screening feature
problems.impact: Unused variable errors in screening feature persisted across epics; quality gate tolerates non-zero tsc error count

problems.title: Fix cycle rate at 50% — 1 of 2 stories required rework
evidence_refs: Section 4 Summary: Story 5.1 1 fix cycle, Story 5.2 0 fix cycles
problems.impact: Story 5.1 IMPORTANT finding (missing StaleOnly filter tests) caught in review; test-first compliance incomplete

problems.title: Limited sample size for E-008 experiment validation
evidence_refs: E-008 result: PASS (limited sample — only 1 new hook vs 5+ hooks in Epic 4)
problems.impact: Experiment E-008 declared PASS with insufficient data; validation based on 1 new hook vs 5+ in prior epic

missing_evidence.item: Backend test execution results (.NET 10 runtime dependency)
missing_evidence.impact: Cannot verify 17 new backend tests pass; unknown if tests are syntactically valid or produce false positives
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Add CI job with .NET 10 SDK or Docker-based test execution; block merge on backend test pass

missing_evidence.item: Code coverage report and threshold enforcement
missing_evidence.impact: Coverage CI configured (A-002) but no coverage data collected; cannot verify coverage targets or identify gaps
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Execute coverage tooling in CI; emit coverage percentage to evidence bundle; fail build on threshold violation

missing_evidence.impact: E-008 experiment validation incomplete; exhaustive-deps enforcement not verified
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Capture ESLint output in quality signals section; fail on any exhaustive-deps warnings/errors

missing_evidence.item: End-to-end AC verification in integrated environment
missing_evidence.impact: Zero Epic 5 ACs verified in browser; Docker Compose exists but unused; integration gaps undetected
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Use Docker Compose for demo walkthrough; verify all ACs in containerized environment; document demo results per AC

missing_evidence.item: TypeScript error count baseline and enforcement
missing_evidence.impact: Pre-existing tsc errors tolerated; no signal when new errors introduced vs carried forward
missing_evidence.proposed_instrumentation: Record tsc error baseline per epic; fail CI if error count increases; create backlog item to resolve pre-existing errors

candidate_actions.title: Unblock backend test execution with .NET 10 runtime or Docker-based CI
candidate_actions.description: Backend tests and demos are completely blocked by missing .NET 10 runtime. Install .NET 10 SDK on host OR configure CI to run tests in Docker container using existing Dockerfile.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: Backend test suite executes successfully in CI; test results included in evidence bundle; demo walkthrough uses Docker Compose for integrated AC verification

candidate_actions.title: Execute and report code coverage in evidence bundle
candidate_actions.description: Coverage CI configured (Epic 4 A-002) but no coverage data collected in Epic 5. Execute coverage tooling (dotnet test --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" and vitest --coverage) and include results in Section 3 Quality Signals.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: Frontend and backend coverage percentages reported in evidence bundle; coverage thresholds enforced in CI; build fails if coverage drops below configured threshold

candidate_actions.title: Capture ESLint results in quality signals
candidate_actions.description: ESLint exhaustive-deps enforcement is critical for E-008 experiment, but ESLint results not included in evidence bundle. Run ESLint and capture output in Section 3 Quality Signals.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: ESLint execution results included in evidence bundle; zero exhaustive-deps warnings/errors; CI fails on any ESLint errors

candidate_actions.title: Resolve pre-existing TypeScript errors in screening feature
problem_refs: Pre-existing TypeScript errors carried from Epic 4
candidate_actions.description: Three unused variable errors in ScreeningLayout.tsx and useScreeningSession.ts carried from Epic 4 into Epic 5. Remove unused variables or apply them to resolve tsc errors.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: tsc -b reports zero errors; TypeScript error count baseline documented; CI fails on any new tsc errors

candidate_actions.title: Add test-first compliance check to prevent missing test findings
candidate_actions.description: Story 5.1 IMPORTANT finding revealed missing StaleOnly filter tests, caught in review rather than pre-commit. Add checklist to implementation plans: 'All query parameters have corresponding handler tests (happy path + edge cases)'.
candidate_actions.success_criteria: Fix cycle rate drops below 25% in Epic 6; zero 'missing test' findings for query/command parameters in Epic 6 reviews
